changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE users ( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, email VARCHAR(150) UNIQUE, name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, contact_name VARCHAR(150) NOT NULL, password VARCHAR(255), user_role SMALLINT, phone VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, is_active BOOLEAN, is_first_access BOOLEAN, creation_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, created_by VARCHAR(100), modification_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, modified_by VARCHAR(100) );
